text.section: In Part II of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Foot peddler" means a peddler who travels on foot.
"Motor vehicle peddler" means a peddler who travels by motor vehicle.
"One horse peddler" means a peddler who travels with a wagon or other vehicle drawn by 1 horse or other beast of burden.
"Two horse peddler" means a peddler who travels with a wagon or other vehicle drawn by 2 horses or other beasts of burden.
